Package edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util.wordsim.strategy

Interface ComparisonStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
AtLeastOneStrategy, MajorityStrategy
public interface ComparisonStrategy
A comparison strategy determines how the verdicts of multiple WSMs regarding a specific comparison are combined.

    Method
    Description
    boolean
    areWordsSimilar(ComparisonContext ctx, List<WordSimMeasure> measures)
    Evaluates whether the words from the given ComparisonContext are similar by combining the verdicts of the specified word similarity measures.

  • Method Details

    • areWordsSimilar

      boolean areWordsSimilar(ComparisonContext ctx, List<WordSimMeasure> measures)
      Evaluates whether the words from the given ComparisonContext are similar by combining the verdicts of the specified word similarity measures.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the context containing the words
      measures - the measures to use
      Returns:
      Returns true if the words are similar.
